page.title: 19A DAY IN THE LIFE
page.content: I get up at five to eight. Then I have breakfast. I have cornflakes and toast, then I wash. After that I brush my teeth and put on my school clothes. Then I go to school. First Mrs. Pedley calls the register. Then we go into Assembly. Then we do English, then go out to play.I play football. After that we do maths and then have dinner. I have pasty, baked beans and ice cream. After dinner we go into the field to play football. In the afternoon we do activities like cooking, clay, music and Lego.We do this until 3-30, then we go home.When I get home I play with Tom Fagg. Sometimes we play cricket. Then I have my Tea. After Tea I play cricket with my Dad. Then I read to him, and I go to bed at 7-30, turn off the light and go to sleep.
